title: Leadership Competency Enhancement: Learner-Centered Spatial Concept-Based Mathematics Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design complex mathematical problem-solving pathways in three or more stages using spatial concept modeling within five days
Learners can revise their learning pathways (Niche) two or more times through collaborative feedback with peer learners
Learners can achieve a weekly learning progress rate of 70% or higher using 10-minute microlearning steps in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
